name: The Real DECKER
description:
Truly the best of interactivity brought to you by the Victorville Film Archive and your own superior minded movie knowledge worker, Gregg Turkington. A full-motion visual novel painfully written, edited, and programmed by Yours Truly. Thank you #Greggheads

Challenge yourself to an explosion of choice and adventure! Meet a colorful cast of characters and pass through the very dimension of time and space. Your every choice will determine the outcome of your epic adventure. Thrill to the sights and sounds of a professional grade video production along with the most advanced computer choices available to humans in our present day.
